item.title: नलचरित्रनाटकम्
item.description:

EDITOR’S NOTE

I HAVE great pleasure in offering my sincere thanks to the following gentlemen who were pleased to lend me the use of their manuscripts of the NalaCaritra Nāṭaka in the preparation of this edition.

  1. Professor S. Kuppuswamy Sastri, Curator, Government Oriental Manuscripts’ Library, Madras.

  2. M.R.Ry. A. Mahadeva Sastri, Director, Adyar Library.

  3. M.R.Ry. Subrahmanya Sastri of Tanjore.
